### 2. Extract Blog Posts Content
The Ghost node extracts all the posts of your blog with content and metadata. In the second node, we extract description, URL, content and features image url.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
### 3. Generate a Linkedin Post for each Post with an AI Agent
This block loops through all the posts pulled by the Ghost Node, send the content to the AI agent that generates a Linkedin post. The results are combined and pulled in a Google Sheet.

#### How to setup?
- **AI Agent with the Chat Model**:
   1. Add a **chat model** with the required credentials *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt with your **post signature** and additional points you want to add in your posts
  [Learn more about the AI Agent Node]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
- **Record Long Break in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record your working sessions
   4. Map the fields
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
